title: Money movers
creator_credit: South Australian Film Corporation, Matt Carroll and Bruce Beresford
brief_description: An armoured payroll van is attacked and robbed but this is merely an overture to a much larger multi-dollar theft by the members of a security company. Based on an actual incident and adapted from a book by Devon Minchin. Stars Bryan Brown, Terence Donovan and Tony Bonner.
creator_credit_for_label: South Australian Film Corporation, Matt Carroll and Bruce Beresford
description: An armoured payroll van is attacked and robbed but this is merely an overture to a much larger multi-dollar theft by the members of a security company. Based on an actual incident and adapted from a book by Devon Minchin. Stars Bryan Brown, Terence Donovan and Tony Bonner.
